Elements.Name: IncludeDir0
Description: In certain stages in the original game and the Unleashed Project, settings for Sonic's physics have overrides. Adjust this option according to whether you are playing the original game or the Unleashed Project to remove redundant overrides, allowing Sonic to handle more consistently across all of these cases. Or, set it to 'none' if you are not playing either of those (for example, a different stage mod).

Elements.Name: IncludeDir1
Description: Select whether Modern Sonic will have the Homing Attack mapped to the Boost button or the Jump button.
Load settings recommended for use with the original game. This setting also addresses a glitch that can occur in Crisis City Act 2.
Load settings recommended for use with the Unleashed Project.
Map the Homing Attack to the Boost button.
Map the Homing Attack to the Jump button.
